name: GorillaSpot Media
overview:
GorillaSpot Media is a New York City-based video technology company that builds clip driven applications for media and entertainment companies to engage and interact with their audiences across the social web.

The company sits at the intersection of media, advertising and technology and has developed four unique products that provide content owners with innovative ways to promote their material, advertisers a unique way to target and connect with their audiences, and individuals a way to express themselves across their social networks using clips from popular entertainment. The company’s video technologies have been utilized by well-known entertainment brands across major film studios, television networks and sports leagues such as Paramount Pictures, HBO, CBS Sports, ABC, Big Ten Network, FX Networks, MTV, Major League Baseball, IGN.com and South Park Studios.
